717824f-a.text:
The N.W. corner of Isham Park, Broadway, west side, opposite 214th Street.

October 26, 1927.

P. L. Sperr.

717818f-a.text:
Broadway, at the S.W. corner of Isham Street (right, not seen), showing the Church of the Good Shepherd, R.C. and its Rectory, that face on Cooper Street which parallels Broadway.

June 8, 1933.

P. L. Sperr.

717819f-a.text:
Broadway, at the S.W. corner of Isham Street, and showing a view westward on Isham Street. Building shown is the rectory of the Church of the Good Shepherd and is at the S.E. corner of Cooper Street.

June 8, 1933.

P. L. Sperr.
